price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߣߴߌ ߣߊ߬ߣߍ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ ( ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߫ ) ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߣߵߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߬ ߣߴߌ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ߕߌ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
